title: Status Effects
content: nd its turns trying to move as far away from the creature who turned it as possible. It can't willingly move to a space within 30ft of that creature. It also can't take Reactions. For its Actions, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. The condition ends upon taking damage.
